block.p: TORSNEY-Jean. On August 14, 2000. Cherished daughter of the late George & Katherine Torsney, beloved wife of John Kent, dear sister of Bernard Torsney, George Torsney, Rose Schmidt and the late Patricia Gannon. Also survived by seventeen loving nieces and nephews. Reposing at Edward D. Lynch Funeral Home, 43-07 Queens Blvd, Sunnyside, NY. Funeral Mass St. Raphael's R.C. Church, Thursday, 10AM. Interment Calvary Cemetery.
